description: Fishing excursions, long-distance treks or forest adventures – no matter what you’re up to, you’ve got a good companion in Singi Overshirt. It will keep cold winds out and can even handle a brief shower, especially if you treat it with Greenland Wax now and then. At the same time, it releases moisture, making your trekking experience more comfortable. Many experienced trekkers believe that a G-1000 shirt is great for all kinds of trips into nature
name: Fjallraven Singi Overshirt - Mens
